website_summaries.verdict: A light, comfortable jacket that layers well for cold winter days.
pros: A great down alternative if you like to layer clothes
Includes a piece of fleece at the top to warm your neck and cuffs that go over the hands to keep them warm
cons: May be tight for women with larger chests
Without layers, suitable only for mildly cold days

customer_reviews.title: Jacket does NOT bear signature contrasting Columbia logo on sleeve ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket does NOT bear signature contrasting Columbia logo on sleeve OR Omni heat logo on wrist plus jacket tail is joined and curved.. not satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Judith D

customer_reviews.title: ... upsize from a S to a M - I love the jacket
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to return it to upsize from a S to a M - I love the jacket. The design is great, and I could already feel the warmth just trying it on. For size reference for others - 36 C/D chest, size 6 jeans from Gap. Across the chest and at the bottom at my hips is where it was too tight and if I had any type of sweater or thicker top on under it, it would be too tight. When I stretched my arms out front all the way I could feel it pulling across my back too much, so decided to upsize to a M instead, so that should fit just right now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: The BEST winter coat but be sure to size up!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coat! So warm and the thumb-y sleeves are the best (keeps the wind from blowing up your sleeve). I like how the pockets are fleece lined too. Only down size is you need to size up about 2 sizes. I wear a size 14/16 and I usually wear a L/XL top. I ordered a 2XL in this and it fits perfectly (with room for a sweater underneath).
customer_reviews.author: Julie from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty thin and I would not go skiing or do ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I thought this would be warmer than it was. In my opinion, it is pretty thin and I would not go skiing or do outdoor activities in winter time as some reviewers suggested. It would be a great fall or spring jacket. But I have plenty of those so I sent this one back. In general, I love Columbia wear and find it true to size but this jacket is definitely more fitted.
customer_reviews.author: eRob

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new jacket
customer_reviews.text: I tried on this jacket in a store and fell in love, but the color was wrong. So, when I got home, I found the grey color here. And it's perfect. The fit is a little small, but I expected that because I'd already tried it on. My favorite part might be the thumb holes at the end of the sleeves. The jacket is very warm, and doesn't have a hood, which was my preference because I hate my long hair hanging over a hood on my back. I absolutely love this jacket. Thinking about getting it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bowen

customer_reviews.title: ... for this jacket based on the reviews and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering a size up for this jacket based on the reviews and I'm glad I did. I purchased this jacket for my trip to Colorado. I went snowshoeing twice in heavy snow and wind and this jacket kept me super warm and dry. It's really thing, so you don't feel like you are wearing something bulky. I did wear layers underneath (under armour, t-shirt, and flannel shirt) and it was still roomy. Hands down the best jacket I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Manguno

customer_reviews.title: Is kinda snug.
customer_reviews.text: Great coat! However, this coat is sleek. I purchased a M for my 13 YO who wears a size 4. It fits, but only with a t-shirt on. She cannot wear this with a thick hoodie or sweat shirt...but then again, based on style of coat, I'm thinking you're not supposed to. She says she sweats in it that it is almost too warm. Too warm? We live in WNY...there is no such thing as too warm in the winter. I had contemplated purchasing myself a new coat, but since I live in hoodies...that's not happening. Def. size up once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Cappyaldu

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite coat! For as lightweight as this is, it sure does keep me warm. I’ve been intrigued by the omniheat I’ve seen in Columbia coats and I really like this! I’ve worn it out in 20-30 degree weather and have stayed warm enough. I ordered a large to allow for winter sweaters and thick sweatshirts underneath. I would normally wear a medium. I think I could have gone either way but I’m happy with the large - I would rather have a little extra room and slightly not enough
customer_reviews.author: Deniece Beekman

customer_reviews.title: ... small for my daughter (5'3" 118lbs) but it was pretty loose so we exchanged for XS which fits her ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally got the small for my daughter (5'3" 118lbs) but it was pretty loose so we exchanged for XS which fits her much better and she can still fit base layer and mid layer underneath. We got this for skiing and were a little worried it wouldn't be warm enough because it is so thin, but she has been warm and happy so far! She loves the hand cuffs
customer_reviews.author: Csquared

customer_reviews.text: April 2019 update: I have worn this jacket throughout the entire Minnesota winter and I am SO in love! The only thing I dont like is that it had some loose stitching up near the left breast area with a itty bitty hole when I got it. It was nothing to worry about until the whole started growing in circumference. -----‐------‐-------------‐------- Original post..Nov 2018: So comfortable and so warm. Its 43* today and I was very warm. It turned into being too hot to wear within a minute or two of being in a store. I will update when the weather gets colder!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Columbia jackets my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I live in NJ--New York City area. It's cold this November, but not terribly so... average 45F. Anyway, I needed a jacket that would keep me warm and warmer if I put a sweater under it, but not too warm as I'm in and out of the house and car all day. This jacket is perfect, plus I ordered it in black which makes me look slimmer. I've always been a fan of Columbia jackets and will remain so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stained so easily but otherwise wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket- the fit, the color, the warmth. Maybe I got a bad one because mine stained just by looking at it it seemed! I only owned it for 3 days and it had several stains on it. I was unable to get them out even with using stain remover and washing several times. I only went shopping in it- didn't eat greasy food or work outside. I have no idea how it got so many stains so soon but I had to send it back. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: 3princesses

customer_reviews.title: This jacket delivered on fit, style and warmth!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight but warm jacket for a trip to Ireland earlier this month. I was a little nervous when it arrived as even though it looked and fit perfectly, I was unsure of how warm it would really keep me. It truly is lightweight and can be folded or rolled into a suitcase taking up almost no room. I am a size 1 and my heavy sweater took up more room than this did. Bear in mind that I am a Florida native and days in the mid 50's are dead of winter for me. So...this jacket delivered! On a 38 degree evening, I needed only a lightweight long sleeve shirt and a scarf. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4 and weigh 136. I purchased this jacket in a Large and I am glad that I did. The jacket fits me perfectly but does not allow for additional roominess over bulky sweaters. It came packaged in a large mailing bag and was fitted into my mailbox. At first, I thought I made a mistake and bought a sweatshirt. The jacket is light, which I like and is great looking while on and hugs my waste and hips very well. It is very good looking while on. The jacket is well made and a steal at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the snow!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really a 5star but there product came to me with a security tag still attached. I had to go to Columbia and get the tag removed. The staff was shocked and said it was most likely stolen which is terrible. I have to say I get the most compliments on this jacket that I bought another one in maroon. I still get compliments on both. Will probably buy a 3rd. Super cute, keeps you warm without layering. I even wore it in the snow in Montana and was impressed on staying warm with this jacket again without layering. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jacket! It fits great (I typically wear an XL in tops, and the jacket fits comfortably - especially in the arm length, where I usually have problems). It's really thin, but surprisingly warm! The liner sleeves with the thumb holes are great when you're putting your mittens on, or reaching over the car window to scrape ice. Lots of pockets, and they are roomy and zippered. I love the fur lined collar. This jacket looks great with jeans and tennies, or with dressier clothes. Often, when buying online, I'm not completely satisfied once I actually receive things... this was a VERY SMART purchase!! And a great deal compared with retail store price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: I have it 4 stars only because measurements are misleading ...
customer_reviews.text: I have it 4 stars only because measurements are misleading. In my case, I wear a 36D and am a size 8/10. I will have to replace mine with a larger size. I bought a L. Buy up a size of you have large breasts!
customer_reviews.author: QueenieMarie

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket in every way!!! Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket!! It isnt big and bulky. Still shows your curves! Super soft inside and out. Not thick and not too thin, but the Omni Tech on the inside works so great!! This is all i need for super cold weather! This is my 2nd one, different color!! Bought my first one a little over a year ago and it still looks and works great! Very durable for being so soft!! Columbia always delivers!! You wont be disapointed with this jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Warmth w/o the bulk, Omni a must!
customer_reviews.text: Warmth with out the bulk. I have had my eye one this coat for 3 years every time I seen it on a person... It always looked good. I finally needed a new coat. Cost was lower than normal when I purchased, which was an added bonus for over all satisfaction. I would not have a winter coat/snow boots without the Omni liner, it has truly proven the difference in comfort in the cold. I love to be outdoors in the winter..
customer_reviews.author: TMBW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all-around jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is the best jacket I have ever bought. It is light enough to wear when the weather is just a little chilly, but also keeps me warm in 0 degree weather as well. The outer shell feels like a down jacket and is incredibly soft. I have also gotten multiple compliments on how good the jacket looks. One piece of advice: order a size up. I ordered a small at first, and it fit just a little tight and definitely had zero room for layering underneath. Returned, got a medium, and it fits perfectly with room to wear a sweater of hoodie underneath if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket!! It runs true to size but I ordered one size up to accommodate sweaters and hoodies underneath. It's super lightweight and extremely comfortable. I needed a new winter jacket in general but I wore this on a trip to the Oregon coast in February. Generally the weather is overcast with temps in the 50s but this time it got so cold it actually snowed on the beach! This jacket kept me warm and dry the entire time, through rain, wind, and snow, with only a t shirt and hoodie underneath. I'm buying another one as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I have it in a size large and i I ordered it in an xl hoping it would layer well over lighter fleece. I’m returning because it is a bit big. I will only order large from now on . The large keeps me warm especially when on walks with my dogs. It’s not great for layering over bulky pieces because it’s a fitted coat . I’m 155 lbs and 5’ 8”. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: kjdf

customer_reviews.title: My most fave jacket ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket so much. It’s super warm and also doesn’t overheat you. I’m currently wearing it at -5 in Alaska, and I comfortably wore it at 30-40 degrees as well. The insulation is perfect and the temp control is amazing. It’s not for surviving at -10 but it does the job of a coat when going from work to car, to store etc.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: It's great for anything from low 40's to below freezing
customer_reviews.text: I adore this jacket. It's great for anything from low 40's to below freezing. It wasn't quite enough to keep me warm when it was below 20. It is comfortable and very lightweight. Got about 5 months of regular use out of it and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: MessieJessie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect coat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing coat. It's light weight but keeps you warm with the omniheat lining, I live in PA and weather is all over the place here. I have two of these, actually. One white and one black. I would say order one size up from normal. I wear medium shirts but the large coat fits the best, but I do like my coats a little bigger and not too tight. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Definitely order up - even if you confirm your measurements!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color (Nocturnal)! I checked the size guide before purchasing and even measured myself to make sure I was ordering the right size. The XL should have been plenty big, but it’s not. It zips over my chest, but it’s SNUG. I am debating whether to exchange it for a larger size which will likely be too big everywhere else or just completely return it. Super bummed, but it looks and feels like it could’ve been a great jacket - If it fit as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So perfect
customer_reviews.text: As a forever student, I’m used to buying cheap jackets at cheap stores. One day I decided I deserved to splurge and buy a quality coat. I LOVE this coat. It is light and warm. I was hesitant about no hood, for those few days it’s cold and there’s a surprise rain, but honestly I don’t even care anymore. I promise I’ll never go back to cheap jackets again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen LL

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is a great all purpose jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a great all purpose jacket. The omni-tech insulation keeps my girlfriend very warm. If it's very cold outside it's great for layering, though if it's in the high 40s-50s it's great as a single layer jacket. This newer line also has the fleece on the inside of the collar, which looks much nicer than older models and also helps keep the face warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ty C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light but warm jacket
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jacket. I can't believe how perfectly it fits. I'm a shortie - only 5'2" - but the jacket fits my torso really well. It is warm without being so toasty that it is uncomfortable. I am from Texas so I'm not the best at dealing with cold weather. On a recent trip to West Virginia, when the temps didn't creep above freezing, I managed to say warm and toasty inside my jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good for snowshoeing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a lightweight jacket for snowshoeing. With limited snowshoeing experience, and limited weather opportunities for snowshoeing, I didn't want to spend too much. $50 was ideal. Fits well, keeps me warm, but not too warm, love the color, allows movement.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Light but Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome jackets and warm for the midwest winters. It was bought for my sister after I have had three. Highly recommend. Fits smaller, I'm 5'8 and she's 5'2. 125-140 lbs. We usually wear a medium but bought a large and perfect for both to wear any tops under.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I've been looking for this style for quite sometime and most are very expensive so I tried this one due to the lower price. I love the lined collar and the lining of the rest of the coat really does reflect body heat back. One of my favorite purchases of late.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this jacket! I ordered the jacket in a 3x, I wear a 2X in clothing, but wanted to get something to have room when I wear a sweatshirt underneath. The jacket fits so well! Plenty of room for a sweater or sweatshirt, but not too big. It seems pretty warm when you have a sweatshirt or sweater underneath. I wouldn't wear it in the bitter cold with just a short sleeve shirt underneath, but I found it to be very warm and fit very well. I would buy this jacket again!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome! It's lightweight, easy to pack, and keeps you warm and toasty. I would definitely size up, however. I ordered the small, which is the size I normally wear, and it was tight with just a T-shirt on. The medium was perfect. I could easily fit a base layer and long sleeve T-shirt underneath. The omni heat aspect works so well that I took the jacket off while cross-country skiing because I got too warm. The jacket also does a great job keeping you dry. I went sledding and played in the snow and never felt wet afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy for NOV weather!
customer_reviews.text: Very Warm and light jacket. JUST what i was looking for. I am 5'6 and 185lbs.. usually wear 38C bra.. a Large fit me Great not too loose not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... who is 5'10 1/2 and a large fit her nicely. She says it is super warm but be ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who is 5'10 1/2 and a large fit her nicely. She says it is super warm but be careful about placing chocolates in the pockets. They melted real fast. The only thing she has issues is when it is really windy, she said it feels like the wind goes right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette L. Bakken

customer_reviews.title: Great idea -- excellent if bulkiness is premium value
customer_reviews.text: Interesting.... PROS: Tried it out in rainy 35*F- very warm over a light wool sweater. Tried it inside out - doesn't work. Looks nice CONS: Runs small in midsection...suggest size up. Seam threads coming loose after one week's light wear. Exterior coat fabric "catches" easily and pulls threads. Will not wear well. Summary: Idea great, better fabric would be appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Desert  Nurse Practitioner

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket- runs small
customer_reviews.text: Bought one as a gift- decided I liked it enough for me. I think its a bit more fitted than my other Columbia coats, cant wear anything thick or bulky under it. Because of the cut, I dont think it would look right to size up. It is so warm for a thin jacket! I find myself wearing it into spring thinking it is ok cause its lightweight-but Im always too hot. Definitely a winter coat! The white isnt solid - the cuts in the design give it the appearance that it is sheer ( but it isnt) in areas. I like the colors better- pink , purple and teal green. The colors are bright and a bit shiny -FYI.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, beats WI winter
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I wear it in the dead of WI winter up to 20 below. It isnt instant, you need to generate some body heat but once you do you wont be cold. Occasionally I do put a light sweatshirt underneath. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find the right fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" and 125lbs. I wanted to like this jacket because it's so warm and lightweight, but for me size Small was too tight under the arms when layered with a sweater. The arms were also a little too short to comfortably use the thumbholes. The collar was also too high to be comfortable - it chafed against my chin when it was fully zipped up. I've tried size M in the similar Mighty Lite III jacket which has a similar fitted style, but that was too wide at the hips so it let cold air in.
customer_reviews.author: Tanalai

customer_reviews.title: Small and price keeps going up
customer_reviews.text: Runs small, is thin like a sweatshirt. Had to return, no option to exchange... Price went up $60 from what I paid... Going with a different jacket because of this. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Morse

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: 1/23/20 update - 2nd one ordered. Bought this for my daughter and she loves it! She needed a winter coat and she’s a small but I ordered up after reading the reviews glad I did or it would have had to be returned!! She’s 5’ 130lbs. Great coat!!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy BB

customer_reviews.title: well tailored but not as warm
customer_reviews.text: fit very well but wasn't nearly as warm as reviews stated. I am 5'3 and 115lbs and got an XS. wore it with a long sleeve shirt in 35-40F weather and was cold. but, it certainly is well made, lightweight, and very flattering/had a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L.

customer_reviews.title: Great winter jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a winter coat for a trip to Yosemite but I wanted something that was lightweight for traveling, since I live in Southern California and only need winter gear when I travel. This coat was perfect- super warm super lightweight. It has thumb hole cuffs which I love. It looks pretty stylish for a winter jacket - except the fuzzy collar - I just zip it all the way to hide that. It's wind proof and has some fancy shiny space fabric lining which keeps you very warm. packs small and light for backpacking too.
customer_reviews.author: Duckworthy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely & warm daily wear jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I just got it so I can't speak on water resistance, but the fit is great, and it's very warm. Sitting outside in 30 degree weather and I am quite comfortable. The thumb holes are great and actually go further down my hand than I am used to, which I love. I definitely recommend this for a daily wear if you live in a folder climate, I live in CO. For reference, I am 5'6" and 135 lbs. I got the large and it fits perfectly, there is room for a hoodie or sweater underneath, but it still looks clean and fitted with just a normal shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these coats
customer_reviews.text: I am a very cold person. This is my third purchase of this jacket. Light weight, fitted yet not tight. I will continue to buy these. They wash very well even the white ones. I am 5' 5" and weigh 140 and I get a large instead of my normal medium.
customer_reviews.author: R. Linley

customer_reviews.title: Nice short jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is cute, well made but not roomy enough for me. I got the size XL but there wasn't enough room for layers. Columbia tends to run small. I am 5ft 8.5 and 175-180. So I am ok for XL and 1X. This is needed to be 1X.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: These are our favorite jackets. My daughter and I have 4 each ...
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite jackets. My daughter and I have 4 each and we absolutely love them. The Omni-heat gives them enough additional warmth that we can wear them in the winter if we layer with sweaters or additional coats. I also will layer with a waterproof jacket when it's raining. Definitely recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but still warm and comfortable. The fleece lined collar is nice and soft and the thumb holes are a bonus. It has loops on the cuffs like it’s supposed to be the liner to a full Columbia coat. It doesn’t bother me but it’s a little odd given that it’s described as a separate jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this jacket - warm & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! It's light-weight, warm and fits well. I ordered the 2X, but all my other coats are 1X, so it runs a little small, but the sleeve length was great for being 5'10". Love the thumb loops and the fuzzy collar. I wear this all the time! It's great because if it gets hot, it's really light to carry around and folds up really small. The pockets are fairly large, which is nice. Just wish it had a hood. Would totally buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie H.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite coat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Columbia lover, and have owned many Columbia coats over the years. My favorite outerwear brand hands down. Fit, price and flattery are all in my favor. I love the detail on this coat. The fabric and stitching are very flattering. Thinner coat, but still very warm. I wouldn't recommend this if you're going to be out in extreme conditions. I want one in every color! I am 5'8 190lbs and I ordered an XL (my normal columbia size) and it fits PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: The jacket fits fine. The over-the-hand cuffs are awesome and keep your ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fits fine. The over-the-hand cuffs are awesome and keep your hands warm. It's very flattering with the design on the material on the sides and back. The bad part: the zippers for the pockets get caught on the pocket lining almost every time it is zipped or unzipped. It is frustrating. The main jacket zipper closure gets caught occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: nikiwing

customer_reviews.title: Nice lines.
customer_reviews.text: Love the slim look of this coat. Haven't had much bad weather to test it out for warmth, but for looks, I am very happy. Fits well, even across the shoulders, which is often a problem for me. It is very light, and stuffs away nicely when you don't need it. Goodbye bulky parkas!
customer_reviews.author: jstock

customer_reviews.title: Too small, sizing off
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 or L, and the size large of this jacket is way too tight. Makes me feel like a stuffed sausage. Very disappointing. I don't even know if the XL would fit. Seems nice otherwise. Shoulders are narrow, arms are long.
customer_reviews.author: shoobeedoo

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket !
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, very lightweight yet - I wore it November in England with temperatures 45 F and light rain ; I kept warm with a knit long sleeve top under the jacket , plus wore a warm scarf around my neck. Have cold washed jacket in machine already and air dried ; looks like new ! The small was perfect for me. Could even wear sweater under it. I am 34 bust and petite build.
customer_reviews.author: Christi vila

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. I do not like big and balky coats. I finally found one that keeps me very comfortable in the cold cold weather and does not make me look like the Michelin man. Thanks I will buy this coat again...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Truly thin and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how thin and lightweight this jacket is. The medium fits perfectly with some room to layer or to wear with a sweater or heavy duty flannel. This is exactly the type of jacket I've been looking for to hike or disc golf in colder weather. Stylish enough too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good down to about 40 degrees
customer_reviews.text: This is a warm, lightweight jacket. It's good down to about 40 degrees. I wore it in the rain and it is not waterproof, but it is water resistant enough that once I made it inside, I could shake the water off and it would be dry. I'm very happy with this jacket. I did order a size larger than I normally wear and it fits fine; I think it would be too tight in the shoulders and chest if I ordered my regular size.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Can Wear Sweatshirt Underneath
customer_reviews.text: Love my Columbia Kaleidaslope II Jacket! I ordered mine in black and a size medium and it fits perfectly with room to wear a sweatshirt underneath! I usually debate between a size small and medium depending on the brand, and Columbia normally goes true to size, which is why in the past I've ordered their fleece jackets in small, but never have room to wear a sweatshirt underneath, so I ordered the medium in this jacket and I have enough room plus it's warm and light!
customer_reviews.author: Trudi

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight jacket for fall weather
customer_reviews.text: great lightweight jacket for fall weather. very warm on 40 degree day. haven't tried it in winter cold yet. isn't bulky, you forget you have it on. simple and functional. great for driving, walking because it isn't in the way. I want to order more, different colors, the price was good, too. well made and I love the Columbia brand because they make great product without being brand snobs or showy. just great items at great prices.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: High tech winter gear
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what Columbia is famous for! High tech winter gear that doesn’t need the bulk. Only thing missing is a hood, but perfect if you don’t want one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: warm, comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love the tall fleecy neck, the dots really do reflect body heat so you get a warm jacket without the bulk and weight. Pair it up with the outer shell for really cold weather. Used it skiing in -15o F with a base layer and warm t-neck sweater and stayed comfortable even on the ride uphill
customer_reviews.author: Fran Leyman

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Lives to the expectation of the Columbia Jackets. This really keeps you warm in the harsh winters and is water resistant. A must have to brave the weather!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is very light weight and rolls up great for my backpack.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket color is very pretty, and the cut is quite stylish. I like the “fur” collar, I don’t need to pack a scarf just zip the jacket all the way up. I think the jacket runs a little small, I usually wear a medium but ordered a large to be able to wear a bulky sweater underneath. The jacket fits perfect with a light shirt like sweater. I like the jacket so much I ordered a dark blue one for a friend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jul Daven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat - great for overheated people
customer_reviews.text: I can see why some say it should be a little bit longer in length, but as someone who commutes on their bicycle every day, this length works for me. I wore this on the coldest day so far this season and it held up well. I am pleased that it keeps me warm without overheating (as most winter coats do to me). Just wish there was a hood!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bissaro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar jacket and my daughter kept borrowing it and she never puts anything back so I bought her this. Shes a small, I got a medium. She loves it. But now shes wearing my winter coat
customer_reviews.author: Nastia

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Based on some of the reviews I got a large instead of a medium which I usually wear because I have a large chest, I'm glad I did that because it fits perfectly well. It was a bit loose in other areas, but that isn't from them, it's just my body. This is very warm, soft, and comfortable. I'm really happy with this purchase. I haven't tried it in extremely cold weather, so I can't say how warm you'll be in very cold temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Sporty with a nice shape
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. Its sporty but also has a nice feminine shape. I was worried that the arms would be too tight, but they are fine. (I bought the XL, my upper arms with a sweater are 15.5" around.) I live in MN, and the weather here has been below 0 a few times now. You definitely need a warm sweater with the jacket in this cold, but it's surprisingly warm considering how thin the material it is. Love that its not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: JanelA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in ND!
customer_reviews.text: I live in northern ND!!! ( crazy, I know). But I don't like bulky coats... I'm too active and in and out for those. I tried this based on reviews, and totally love it. Have been comfortable in 15 degree weather with a light long sleeve shirt under. If I were going to be outdoors in negative temps for longer time, I might choose something heavier, but for my day to day running of kids, errands, gym, etc this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, feminine and comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is warm, comfy and well-fitted. I'm super impressed. Wish I would have bought Columbia coats earlier in life instead of Jessica Simpson or St. John's Bay. I got two sizes just in case, plan to layer for my trip to CO. I'm 5'7 172 lbs but pretty busty up top. Went with the XL and it's perfect. The L was good, just a little tight across the chest and I will need to layer it. Very happy with this purchase. UPDATE: Took this jacket with me to Colorado during spring break and I was actually warm. Perfect for cold weather!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaSizzle2009

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from skiing in Colorado. This was the only jacket I brougt. Lowest temp was 24 but with 36mph gust one day. I was only wearing a thermal shirt, and a fleece light sweater and this jacket. And to my surprise, I did not get cold at all. I love this jacket...in white...so stylish. I weigh 128 and purchased the Small. I am 5'3. The jacket fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: MyBits

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great. I like the material & the thermal inside. I recommend going up a few sizes. I wear a XL-XXL in jackets & coats depending on the material & how it's made. But for this jackets I went up to a 1X. I'm glad I did. It's fits great & will keep me warm for the fall & spring weather.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: 5-STARS!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Lightweight yet warm. I wish the inner cuffs were a bit longer and tighter and there was an attachable hood.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large and it fits perfectly. It is very flattering, I bought another one in black. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. Used it for travel to colder weather. It was perfect to layer yet slim enough to not bulk me up while fitting inside my backpack!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: This jacket did a great job of blocking the wind and keeping me warm
customer_reviews.text: I can not yet attest to how this jacket holds up over time; however, this jacket is fantastically warm! I wore it on a day where they wind chill was 15 degrees and wind gusts were 30 mph. This jacket did a great job of blocking the wind and keeping me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Edwards

customer_reviews.title: love this coat!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about whether this coat would live up to my expectations and keep me warm in the Michigan winters. I read the reviews and decided to take a chance. So glad I did! Its a great coat! I find it runs a bit small, so you may want to order the next size up, especially if you put a bulkier sweater under it. It washes in the washer just fine too. I wear it for everyday, and found out exactly how well it retains your body heat when out shoveling. I love how lightweight it is. I'll be keeping this coat for a long time. I
customer_reviews.author: JJHERM

customer_reviews.title: I love it. But many a Boy Scout Camp later ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this coat since Winter 2012. I love it. But many a Boy Scout Camp later and I needed a fresh one for everyday wear. Thank you for your prompt service, shipping and good price. Will order from again!
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ... for this omni heat jacket because I experienced the great warmth in the past
customer_reviews.text: I searched for this omni heat jacket because I experienced the great warmth in the past. My back is always warm when I wear it. I wear a size 10 and got a size large jacket. I like my clothing to be snug but this jacket is tight. I plan to keep it and not wear any layers.
customer_reviews.author: butterflies9

customer_reviews.title: Amazon used the wrong description
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is really nice but Amazon did not put the correct description on it. I purchased it for my daughter who rides her bike to college in the rain and needed a HOOD. The description states it has a removable liner and an adjustable hood. It has neither.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M Caruso

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite jacket I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite jacket I have ever owned! It is lightweight yet keeps you extremely warm, machine washable and can easily be packed in a suitcase. The comfort cuffs are an added bonus. I was very nervous about snagging it on something but so far so good. Fit as expected with enough room to have layers underneath and still be flattering instead of looking like you are wearing a sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lsimms

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this jacket.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this jacket. It is warm and fits as expected. I love the hand / mitten extensions. Really a nice jacket. Light weight, stylish and warm. Very surprised how warm and how lightweight it is. We had record lows this year in New Jersey (it was colder then Iceland) and it fit my warmth needs as well and actually even better my other old more bulky coats would have. I would have had to layer those and this I did not need to do that but always could have if needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite winter jacket. I think this is the 3rd one I've owned. It's light weight, flattering and I love the cuffed sleeve with thumb hole.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I am a big girl and I don't like bulky coats. This is the thinnest coat I have ever purchased and the warmest coat. Columbia always puts out good quality. I love this coat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele R. Wasserburger

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!  Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: I have had this jacket for the past week. It does keep me warm, the wind didn't stand a chance. It is not bulky at all when you have it on. The inside pocket is a gem. I was able to put my cell phone (inside its case) comfortably in the inner pocket and it didn't feel heavy. Great for those chilly days when you do not need the heavy coat.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S Collins

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable jacket
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable. I fit between a 2x or 3x, and I'm glad I purchased a 3x. I have a long torso, and it is a little short for me, but not terrible. I wish it had a hood.
customer_reviews.author: J & C

customer_reviews.title: I love how light this jacket is but it really keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how light this jacket is but it really keeps me warm. It gets really cold - the "you can feel it in your bones" type of damp cold a handful of days where I live so this jacket has kept the moisture and cold out very well. It also worked really well in protecting me from the elements during a visit to NYC during a week right before snow buried the city; the weather was also wet and cold. I use it on other chilly days without suffocating under its heft. I can't comment on how it'll handle in extremely cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Linh H.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable jacket I have Ever owned!!! Get me WARM Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. was out of town borrowed my sisters. Loved the feel. I wish I would have got a size bigger. Because of the heavy shirts I'll wear underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Baker Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It fits perfectly and is light but warm. I want the longer one too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a casual winter jacket and this is it! The price was so reasonable compared to other websites selling this jacket. It arrived earlier than expected and in perfect condition. It is a little larger than I expected, as others said it ran small. I wear a 12-14 and ordered a XL, I could have gone with the large but the extra room will be great for a sweater under it, although I doubt I will need it. It was very warm and comfortable. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Congi

customer_reviews.title: Best Jacket EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing. It's not bulky at all. People ask me all the time, how does that thing keep you warm!? Well it does! I am the coldest person EVER and this thing keeps me warm on the coldest Chicago winter days. We had a couple "artic blasts" this winter (where it felt like -30 degrees) and this jacket kept me warm! This is by far the best jacket I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Sara

customer_reviews.title: I love this coat
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! Super warm without the bulk. I am 5'9 with long arms. I ordered a size large so I can layer with a vest or sweatshirt underneath. I actually have 3 of the same coat in different colors and ordered this one for my mom. Hoping she loves it just as much as I do. I wear this coat from 40 degrees to 0 degrees. It gets really cold here in SD and at 0 degrees I add a scarf and vest underneath for added warmth. Highly recommend this coat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very warm. A bit tight in the chest but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. A bit tight in the chest but overall wears well. I got a size large (my usual size) and cannot wear bulky sweaters or sweatshirts under.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fits a size small. Great weight for a spring/fall coat in upstate NY.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this coat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coat, I even like the lighter black color. My sister bought one in the dark raspberry and I fell in love with the lightweightness of this jacket. It doesn't take the place of my ski jacket for really cold temps, but overall I would highly recommend it. It does run small especially if you want to wear a winter sweater under it. Can't recommend it enough especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: rivagedream

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Great coat. It gets well below zero here frequently for many days in a row and it keeps me warm. It's very light weight and comfortable. You can wear it over a sweater or under another coat. I love it because it can be stuffed into a small space for travel. I'm a big fan of this coat. When it came I thought how is this light weight coat going to hold up in cold weather but it does, very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No outer coat!
customer_reviews.text: Description says this is a 3 in 1 design with an outer jacket with hood and inner liner with Omni heat technology. What I received does not have a hood and appears to be just the inner liner. It's an attractive liner though.
customer_reviews.author: NDKitchen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous coat by Columbia
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful jacket by Columbia. It is lightweight but warm, extremely stylish with the chevron-styled front and back, and I love the fleece collar, along with the sleeve liners. I have tried many of the current Columbia jackets available this season, and this one is by far my favorite. The fit is true to size and this jacket is cut longer than most hip-length jackets, which in the cold weather is super nice! Can't say enough about this jacket-- it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: B.R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go to Massachusetts in February. It’s cold there. This jacket is very lightweight and kept me plenty warm. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fits small, but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the Omni-heat jackets. This is my second one of this type and they always keep me warm. The problem is that it runs a little small. I'm a large 12/small 14 and I got a large. It's a bit snug, but it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: whitifer

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Kaleidaslope II Jacket, Waterproof & Breathable
product_meta.description: Say hello to your new winter coat: The Columbia Women's Kaleidaslope II Jacket is the perfect multiple-use coat. It is the classic three-in-one design.Professionally engineered at Columbia, with expert assembly, and quality stitching, this jacket system offers a precise fit and longevity in holding up against harsh weather conditions. The waterproof outer shell with its zip-in and 3-point interchange system is designed to integrate with the inner jacket. Each can be worn separately for different climate needs, or zipped together for maximum comfort and warmth in the extremes. For optimal fit and locking the cold air out, the outer shell includes adjustable storm hood, adjustable cuffs, a drawcord adjustable hem, and a drop tail. Loaded with pockets, you'll find snap capped hand pockets, and a zippered chest pocket. The inner layer features our thermal-reflective technology to keep you extra toasty and warm. This versatile coat system covers all the bases for your fall and winter wear needs. This jacket is offered in range of colors and in multiple sizes. To ensure the perfect fit, follow these steps for measuring and refer to the size chart. To determine the neck size, measure at the base or thickest part of your neck. For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the wrist. Round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
feature_bullets: 100% polyester windowpane triple ripstop, Omni-Heat Reflective Microtex Light 100% polyester, 80g Omni-Heat Thermal Insulation 50% Polyester, 50% Recycled Polyester
Water resistant fabric. Interior security pocket Comfort cuffs
Omni-heat insulation 50% polyester/50% recycled polyester OH, 100g
